title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Large scale design of curving stem containing flowers and sheaves with a building, quiver with arrows and a butterfly on a 'fleur de lys' ground. Two reds, black and lavender.

Textile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: cotton
